page.title: 02Shopping
page.content: Rhos and Alltwen are small villages consisting of small grocery stores and newsagents. There are sub-post offices in both, for pensions and postal requirements. In Pontardawe there are a variety of shops, Gateway Supermarket, chemists,shoe shops, butchers, bakers, newsagents, hairdressers, carpet shop, children's clothes shop, photographers, greengrocers, wallpaper shop and ironmongers. There are fish & chip and Indian restaurants, a Chinese takeaway and a small cafe. For bulk buying, variety and competitive prices villagers have to travel outside the area to larger superstores eg. Asda & Tesco.These larger stores also sell household items eg. paint, wallpaper, tools, toys, clothing and footwear. Neath or Swansea have to be visited if a greater selection is required.
